well, i downloaded this, and i have to say im not impressed with this rip at all,,, i have quite a high end system that is more than capable of running this game ( i have an athlon 64 4200+ X2 dual core CPU, 2gb of corsair XMS platinum series ram, and a geforce 8800GTX 768mb graphics card) i get major lag with the game, it stutters all the time, when i try and do manual tricks it doesnt work(both with keyboard, and my saitek gamepad) and also the audio is extremely corrupted to,,, 

though thanks for uploading this game as i have had a chance to try it out first before i decide to buy it, i think the problems is probably because this is a pirated copy, and thats why im experiencing these problems...

p.s. i wont be seeding it, as i have deleted it from my system now, sorry to all those who are looking to download this, if i were u i would look for another version coz this one is poor,,,

ive tried various drivers for my 8800GTX old ones and new, and i still experience all the problems mentioned in my last comment...
right now here (in this tracker) this is 1st rip!

Alright, it's fairly simple - unrar (extract) ONE file, in CD1. Makes more sense to start with rld-thwa.rar -- Repeat that process with all CDs and install. Use Daemon Tools to mount each .cue file you extract.

The Crack I haven't gotten to yet (installing CD5 atm) but again, its very easy. Since I don't know exactly where the Crack is yet, I'll just repost the link above.  www.gamecopyworld.com - You should copy and paste this crack where the game was INSTALLED over the main .exe file.

Should be able to play it from there but don't forget to Update the game itself.

its working i got it 2 work but the thing u have 2 do
get unrar go to disk 1 select all data in disk one drag all the date in unrar image and it will unrar do that to all the diskes and u will get a new file to open this u will need deamon tools lite (this is free)
mount the image file with deamon tools clik deamond tools on the tool bar and then device 1 
find where the image file is (iso) so it should be in disk one u will only see one file click that and then open folder not install 
get the crack file u will see this cant miss it and place on desktop then mount disk 1 agan and this time install when it asked u for disk 2 unmount all drives then mount the image file(iso)from cd 2 and close the thing that comes up saying install (you dont have to if u dont want to but its easyer)then do that to all the disks 
ok when it is installed go 2 the crack on the desktop(i told u to do this and where at the start)open file this click patch install the update/patch,then go to where u saved it the cdrive if u cant find it just right click the tony hawk icon for the start up and the click open file location and it will take u to where u installed it 
ok now open the crack file and u will see the crack(not the patch dnt click that)drag that over to where u installed the game then u will see the game file drop the crack into that 
it will ask u some stuff click move and replace 
then u will have the game oh yea one more thing u play the game u need to click the game file then the thing that said thaw and the game will start,to chang the controls click the game starter on the desktop and it will come up with controls u can chang just dnt click save and play click save and quit u can use a xbox360 controler to hope this helpd and its fine for me i can save it too
